pr_title: Fixed spaces after ML comments in format

timeline.author: szarnekow

timeline.bodyText: Is it correct to use identity comparison here?
timeline.author: szarnekow

replies.bodyText: Yes, but you could also leave it out or use equals. The if's just a very small optimalisation here
replies.author: tivervac

timeline.bodyText: The comment says don't add single spaces but all test cases do have spaces after the comments?
timeline.author: szarnekow

timeline.bodyText: Isn't this comment true for other tokens, too?
timeline.author: szarnekow

replies.bodyText: Yes, but we're already in this case we know we're dealing with whitespace (see the comment on applyHiddenRegionFormatting). The only tokens we can get here are SL/ML comment or WS.
replies.author: tivervac

timeline.bodyText: Not sure about this guard here.
